name: fangio
description: Trusted Agent Runtime - Plan → Approve → Execute → Replay

scripts.build: pnpm --filter @fangio/schema build && pnpm --filter @fangio/tools build && pnpm --filter @fangio/planner build && pnpm --filter @fangio/api build && pnpm --filter @fangio/web build
scripts.test: pnpm --filter @fangio/schema build && pnpm --filter @fangio/tools build && pnpm --filter @fangio/planner build && pnpm --filter @fangio/api build && node --test --test-concurrency=1 packages/*/dist/**/*.test.js apps/api/dist/**/*.test.js scripts/**/*.test.mjs
